job_history.work_description: Sourced, recruited for call center to all departments throughout the company. Maintaining computer system by updating and entering data in BrassRing an responsible for complete on boarding and exit interview paperwork. Compiling reports and spreadsheets in order to keep track of drug test and background checks that are completed for on-boarding process. Complete initial phone interviews to evaluate applicants' qualifications. Scheduling job interviews for field managers after seeing that applicant meet the job requirements. Administer and manage scores tests given to applicants before making the job offer. Help organize job fair and manage files for applicants that are not qualified.

Maintained employee compensation, benefits, PTO, timecards and promotion opportunities. Explained and held trainings for new and existing employees on benefit programs and company rules and regulations. Managed Background Checks from ordering paperwork to documenting results in the system. Requested and completed spreadsheet for drug tests results. Managed internal Human Resources records for two stores and oversaw all investigations and disciplinary actions. Completed exit interview paperwork. Managed and processed time card for payroll processing by manager in a timely manner. Processed new hire paperwork, completed on-boarding process and managed their records. Involved in hiring process by coordinating job posting on the website, reviewing resumes, and performing telephone interviews and reference checks.

Processed invoices and credit memos in accurate in timely manner. Review documents for product returns and loaner fees. Solveed incorrect billing, back up cash applications. Made collection calls to clients periodically Lien, Waiver and NTO. Processed invoice through payment cycle. Insured that all venders are paid in a timely manner. Reconciliation of vendors. Managed vendor/supplier relations; and oversaw the timely, accurate processing of invoices, purchase orders, expense reports, credit memos and payment transactions.

Updated the database with customer calls. Worked with NTO vender helped with reconciliation and ledger Balanced and transmitted daily revenue. AR/AP Filling lien, waiver and managed collection. Coordinated complex travel schedules, accommodations and trip logistics for candidates. Entered personnel and subcontractor data into a central database. Evaluated timecards for accuracy on the regular and overtime hours.

skills.name: Recruitment
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in sourcing, recruiting, and onboarding candidates, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: HR Administration
skills.explanation: Over a decade of experience in managing employee compensation, benefits, PTO, timecards, and promotion opportunities, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Employee Onboarding
skills.explanation: Handled complete onboarding process, including paperwork and training, for multiple employees, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Effectively managed timecards for payroll processing and coordinated complex travel schedules, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Data Entry
skills.explanation: Updated computer systems, entered data in BrassRing, and managed internal Human Resources records, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Conducted telephone interviews, explained benefit programs to employees, and made collection calls to clients, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Payroll Processing
skills.explanation: Processed timecards for payroll processing, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Accounts Payable/Receivable
skills.explanation: Processed invoices, credit memos, and payment transactions, and reconciled vendors, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Vendor Management
skills.explanation: Managed vendor/supplier relations and oversaw the timely processing of invoices and payment transactions, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Involved in hiring process and coordinated job postings, but limited leadership experience, indicating some practical experience.

skills.name: Microsoft Office
skills.explanation: Likely used Microsoft Office for data entry, spreadsheet management, and other administrative tasks, showing a solid working proficiency.
